level_1: Career Roadmapping means planning your work journey step by step.
Courses teach you how to choose the right tech role for you.
They show how to find what skills you already have.
You learn how to research job descriptions.
Good roadmaps help you stay focused and clear.
level_2: Courses explain how to break goals into short and long term.
They help you pick skills that match your dream role.
You learn how to find mentors and role models.
Lessons guide you to update your plan as you grow.
They show how to write your goals clearly.
level_3: Advanced lessons explain switching roles in tech.
They show how to plan for promotions and leadership.
You learn to match your plan with company expectations.
Courses share real stories from industry people.
They teach how to build multiple roadmaps for choices.
level_4: Expert tips help you plan 5-10 years ahead.
You learn to guide juniors with your roadmap.
Lessons show how to align roadmap with trends.
They cover networking and community building.
They explain reviewing and updating goals yearly.
